reviewText: Yes, we've all seen and are quite weary by now of NASA/Goddard theatrics (would that Mark Goddard of "Lost in Space"the-series would have lent his narrative skills to the project to make it more bearable).  TRITE  is not the original, I say again  O R I G I N A L "Men in Space"  T.V. show with Bill Lundigan! Pop an episode in the player - if you can  FIND!  Now THERE was a (Geo)Palian program for all!
